SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SET &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING#="TRUE" ! initial wait : IF &UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME# GT 0 : SET &INIT_WAIT_TIME# = MULT(&UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME#, 60) : P "Initially waiting for [&UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME#] minutes." : WAIT &INIT_WAIT_TIME# : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_JOB_STATUS : P "Job Execution Id: &UC4RB_UIP_JOB_ID#, Job Status: '&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#'" : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_SUCCESS#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "MSG: Job completed successfully." : SET &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING# = "FALSE" : ELSE : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_FAILURE#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Action failed." : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING# = "TRUE" : IF &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_COUNT# GT 0 : SET &LOOP_COND# = "TRUE" : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = 0 : WHILE &LOOP_COND# = "TRUE" : WAIT &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_INT# : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = &LOOP_COUNT# + 1 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_JOB_STATUS : P "Retry Count [&LOOP_COUNT#], Job Status: '&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#'" : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_SUCCESS#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "MSG: Job completed successfully." : SET &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING# = "FALSE" : ELSE : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&UC4RB_UIP_FAILURE#,&UIPATH_JOB_STATUS#) : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Action failed." : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &LOOP_COND# = &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING# : IF &LOOP_COUNT# = &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_COUNT# : SET &LOOP_COND# = "FALSE" : ENDIF : ENDWHILE : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING# = "TRUE" : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully within specified time limit." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Timeout Occurred." : ENDIF
